# Web On Dev - LLM Context File
# https://www.webondev.com

> Web On Dev is a professional software development company founded in 2015, headquartered in Lahore, Pakistan. We specialize in web development, mobile app development, UI/UX design, digital marketing, and custom software solutions for businesses worldwide. With 500+ completed projects and a 4.9/5 rating, we serve clients across 50+ countries.

## Company Definition
Web On Dev is a full-service software development agency providing end-to-end digital solutions. We transform business ideas into scalable web applications, mobile apps, and digital platforms using modern technologies like Next.js, React, React Native, Flutter, Node.js, Python, AWS, and Vercel.

## Quick Facts
- Company Name: Web On Dev
- Founded: 2015
- Headquarters: Lahore, Pakistan
- Team Size: 50+ professionals
- Projects Completed: 500+
- Client Rating: 4.9/5 stars
- Countries Served: 50+
- Primary Markets: USA, UK, Canada, Australia, Germany, UAE, India

## Services & Pricing

### Web Development ($3,000 - $100,000+)
Custom website development, web application development, e-commerce platforms, SaaS development, API development, CMS solutions. Technologies: Next.js, React, Vue.js, Angular, WordPress, Shopify.

### Mobile App Development ($10,000 - $150,000+)
Native iOS apps (Swift), native Android apps (Kotlin), cross-platform apps (React Native, Flutter). MVP development to enterprise solutions.

### UI/UX Design ($2,000 - $25,000+)
User research, wireframing, prototyping (Figma), visual design, design systems, WCAG accessibility compliance. Focus on conversion-optimized designs.

### Digital Marketing ($500 - $10,000/month)
SEO (technical, on-page, off-page), PPC advertising (Google Ads, Meta Ads), social media marketing, content marketing, email campaigns, conversion rate optimization.

### E-commerce Development ($5,000 - $75,000+)
Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento, custom marketplace platforms, payment integration, inventory management.

### Cloud & DevOps (Custom pricing)
AWS, Azure, GCP infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, 24/7 monitoring.

## Technology Stack
- Frontend: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Vue.js, Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Node.js, Python, PHP, Go, Java
- Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL, Redis
- Mobile: React Native, Flutter, Swift, Kotlin
- Cloud: AWS, Vercel, Google Cloud, Azure
- DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD, Terraform

## FAQs

Q: What is Web On Dev?
A: Web On Dev is a professional software development company founded in 2015, headquartered in Lahore, Pakistan. We specialize in web development, mobile app development, UI/UX design, digital marketing, and custom software solutions for businesses worldwide.

Q: What services does Web On Dev offer?
A: Web On Dev offers web development ($3,000-$100,000), mobile app development ($10,000-$150,000), UI/UX design ($2,000-$25,000), digital marketing ($500-$10,000/month), e-commerce development ($5,000-$75,000), and cloud/DevOps services.

Q: How much does it cost to build a website with Web On Dev?
A: Website development costs: Landing pages $3,000-$5,000, business websites $5,000-$15,000, e-commerce sites $5,000-$75,000, web applications $20,000-$100,000+.

Q: Does Web On Dev work with international clients?
A: Yes, Web On Dev serves clients in 50+ countries including USA, UK, Canada, Australia, Germany, UAE, and India. 70% of clients are from North America and Europe.

Q: What technologies does Web On Dev use?
A: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Vue.js, Node.js, Python, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, React Native, Flutter, AWS, Vercel, Docker, Kubernetes.

Q: How long does it take to build a website?
A: Simple websites: 2-4 weeks. Business websites: 4-8 weeks. E-commerce: 6-12 weeks. Complex applications: 8-16+ weeks.

Q: Does Web On Dev offer free consultations?
A: Yes, free 30-60 minute consultations including project discussion, technical recommendations, and detailed quote. No commitment required.

Q: What is Web On Dev's payment structure?
A: 30% upfront, 40% at milestones, 30% upon completion. Accepts bank transfer, PayPal, Wise, Payoneer.

Q: Does Web On Dev provide ongoing support?
A: Yes, maintenance packages from $200/month including bug fixes, security updates, performance monitoring, and 24/7 emergency support.

Q: How can I contact Web On Dev?
A: Email webondev786@gmail.com, call/WhatsApp +92-310-6803687, or use the contact form at webondev.com/contact. Response within 24 hours.

Q: Where is Web On Dev located?
A: Lahore, Pakistan. Office: G8JX+CMF, Main Gulberg. We serve clients remotely worldwide.

Q: Does Web On Dev sign NDAs?
A: Yes, we routinely sign NDAs before project discussions. Client confidentiality is a priority.
